attributes.action: Rescind vaccine mandate as a condition of deployment for NHS & care home staff.
attributes.additional_details: It was the heroic work of the NHS staff who put their lives on the line throughout this pandemic, and it is an absolute travesty that these same heroes now face losing their profession, for which they have trained for many years, spending blood sweat and tears and a great deal of time and money. Staffing numbers are already stretched to breaking point. It is only humane to allow them to exercise their right to not be vaccinated and still provide the service that we have been so reliant on.
attributes.background: Supported by the Prime Ministers announcement confirming an immediate end to work-from-home guidance, along with compulsory mask-wearing and mandatory Covid passes being scrapped, I ask that the 1000's of staff who have chosen, which is there right, to not be vaccinated, be allowed to continue work

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Do not make COVID vaccination a requirement for health and social care workers
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/600872
